forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West southwest wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle sun stretches above Downtown San Francisco, illuminating the cityscape with warmth as a light breeze carries the whispers of the bay. Today’s high will hover around a pleasant 66 degrees, allowing for a day of inviting outdoor activities as the afternoon ushers in mild temperatures around 64. With the west-southwest wind dancing playfully at 5 to 21 mph, one can perhaps hear the distant laughter of people enjoying the vibrant parks, or the soft rustle of cherry blossoms in bloom.

As twilight approaches, the skies will remain mostly clear, lending an inviting clarity to the evening. With temperatures settling to a comfortable low of 49, the cooler air invites a light jacket or sweater, perfect for a stroll along the waterfront or a cozy dinner at one of the local cafés. The marine layer is nowhere to be seen today, with visibility stretching far and wide, lending a striking backdrop of landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge standing prominently against a canvas of blue. So, whether you choose to wander through the bustling streets or relax in the tranquility of a garden, today is a fine day to embrace the simple pleasures of life in this captivating city.
